Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez did not actually say that soldiers are paid "too much." The claim is completely made up.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Rep. Ocasio-Cortez's stance on soldiers' pay by falsely attributing a quote to her.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks any evidence or support to back up the false quote attributed to Rep. Ocasio-Cortez.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Rep. Ocasio-Cortez holds a negative view about soldiers' pay without any basis or evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation or perspective regarding Rep. Ocasio-Cortez's actual stance on soldiers' pay.
